review: metal gear solid v the phantom pain is an awesome game full of weird emergent gameplay and system upon system upon system the story exists as an excuse to sneak around in 1980s afghanistan  africainspired maps in an openworld game if youre looking for a traditional linear narrativedriven metal gear then you may be disappointed mgs v is all about game mechanics with a peppering of story thrown in its not bad its different
